sequence: after escaping henchmen Bond is picked up by Tiffany Case in this car while in Las Vegas; Bond uses it to elude the Las Vegas Police.
Bond is seen early in the movie driving a yellow Stag to Amsterdam, while posing as diamond smuggler Peter Franks.
The car Bond has when Leiter tries to survey Tiffany Case at the funfair. Also used by some of Whyte Electronics security that chase down Bond after he escapes the lab.
the blue-white cars used by the Las Vegas Police. Black ones are later used by Felix Leiter and the CIA agents, when they search the house where Willard Whyte is imprisoned at.
first appear as cars driven by Whyte Electronic security. Later appear as the black-white cars of the Las Vegas Police.
the Slumber Inc hearse that picks up Bond and takes him to the funeral parlor.
Bond commandeers an all-terrain vehicle after he ditches the moon buggy.
Used by Bond to escape from the laboratory. Fast but infamously fragile, one of its wheels can be seen rolling past the camera position as Bond drives by it during the escape.
the mobile crane at Blofeld's Baja oil rig. Used by Bond to wreck Blofeld's Bathosub and destroy the control center for the diamond satellite.
first appears when piloted by diamond smuggler Joe. Later in the film, armed variants are used by US military to siege Blofeld's Baja Oilrig.
Willard Whyte's personal helicopter. Appears during the siege on Blofeld's Baja Oilrig.
used by US military to siege Blofeld's Baja Oilrig.
cruise ship at the end of the movie.
